page.title: 20SCHOOL SPORTS
page.content: There was a close finish to Langtree School sports with just three points separating the top three teams. And it was a second place by Lions captain, Annabel Gaze, in the final relay that gave the team the title,two points ahead of Hawks with Falcons one point behind them. Annabel who achieved two firsts and two seconds,received the trophy from governor,Mr. John Beer.{Other winners: G. Brown(4 wins), D. Beer and C. Fallon (3 wins), Z. Gaze, M.Palmer, H. Fargher, S. Cockbill, N. Horn, D. Fallon and J. Coomber(2 wins), J. Ovenell, D. Goaman, A.Pile, M.Goaman, S. Dowson, B. Hannam, J. Williams, R. Coomber, K. Mills, M. Studd, G. Tucker, K. Garman, R. Weaver, C. Mitchell,C. Barber, T. Fallon, M. Cann, R.Harding, P. Smithers, E.Gaze, C. Findlay and R. Mills.
